```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lmerTest)

data(eclsk2011)

df <- eclsk2011$study1 %>%
      filter(split == 'val') %>%
      filter_at(vars(TWORKS, TPERSIS, TSHOWS, TADAPTS, TKEEPS, TATTEN,
                            TBGCCLR, TBGCBLD, TBABSBK, TBEZDSL, TBTRBST, TBEZDAC, TBNOFIN,
                            TBSTNO, TBWTTSK, TFOLLOW, TBFLWIN), all_vars(!is.na(.))) %>%
      mutate(
        TFOLLOW_sc = TFOLLOW/4*7,
        TATTEN_sc = TATTEN/4*7
      ) %>%
      mutate(
         OATTEN = rowMeans(cbind(TBSTNO, 8-TBTRBST, TFOLLOW_sc, TBWTTSK, 8-TBEZDSL,
                                 TBFLWIN, 8-TBEZDAC, TATTEN_sc, 8-TBNOFIN), na.rm=T),
         OATL = rowMeans(cbind(TWORKS, TPERSIS, TSHOWS, TADAPTS, TKEEPS), na.rm=T),
         OFLOW = rowMeans(cbind(TBGCCLR, TBGCBLD, TBABSBK), na.rm=T)
      ) %>%
      mutate(
        MATL = rowMeans(cbind(TWORKS, TPERSIS, TSHOWS, TADAPTS, TKEEPS, TATTEN), na.rm=T),
        MFLOW = rowMeans(cbind(TBGCCLR, TBGCBLD, TBABSBK), na.rm=T),
        MDIST = rowMeans(cbind(TBEZDSL, TBTRBST, TBEZDAC, TBNOFIN), na.rm=T),
        MINHIB = rowMeans(cbind(TBSTNO, TBWTTSK, TFOLLOW_sc, TBFLWIN), na.rm=T)
      ) %>%
      mutate(
         PATL = rowMeans(cbind(TWORKS, TSHOWS, TPERSIS, TADAPTS, TATTEN, TKEEPS), na.rm=T),
         PSIT = rowMeans(cbind(TBEZDSL, TBTRBST), na.rm=T),
         PDIST = rowMeans(cbind(TBEZDAC, TBNOFIN), na.rm=T),
         PINHIB = rowMeans(cbind(TBSTNO, TBWTTSK, TFOLLOW_sc, TBFLWIN), na.rm=T),
         PFLOW = rowMeans(cbind(TBGCCLR, TBGCBLD, TBABSBK), na.rm=T)
      ) %>%
      mutate(
        XXTCHAPP = rowMeans(cbind(TWORKS, TPERSIS, TSHOWS, TADAPTS,
                                  TKEEPS, TATTEN, TFOLLOW), na.rm=T),
        XXATTNFS = rowMeans(cbind(8-TBEZDAC, 8-TBNOFIN, 8-TBEZDSL,
                                  TBGCBLD, TBGCCLR, TBABSBK), na.rm=T),
        XXINBCNT = rowMeans(cbind(8-TBTRBST, TBSTNO, TBWTTSK,
                                  TBFLWIN, TBPLNAC, TBAPRRK), na.rm=T))
```

```{r}
df %>%
select(XATTNFS, XXATTNFS, TBEZDAC, TBNOFIN, TBEZDSL,
       TBGCBLD, TBGCCLR, TBABSBK) %>% 
filter(is.na(df$XXATTNFS) != is.na(df$XATTNFS))
```
```{r}
(sum(abs(df$XXTCHAPP - df$XTCHAPP)>0.01, na.rm=T))
(sum(abs(df$XXATTNFS - df$XATTNFS)>0.01, na.rm=T))
(sum(abs(df$XXINBCNT - df$XINBCNT)>0.01, na.rm=T))

(sum(is.na(df$XXTCHAPP) != is.na(df$XTCHAPP)))
(sum(is.na(df$XXATTNFS) != is.na(df$XATTNFS)))
(sum(is.na(df$XXINBCNT) != is.na(df$XINBCNT)))

```
# Make models

```{r}
models_read <- list(
  theory = lmer(XRSCALK4 ~ XATTNFS + XTCHAPP + XINBCNT + grade + (1+grade|CHILDID), df,
             REML=F, control=lmerControl(optimizer='bobyqa')),
  
  f3 = lmer(XRSCALK4 ~ OATTEN + OATL + OFLOW + grade + (1+grade|CHILDID), df,
            REML=F, control=lmerControl(optimizer='bobyqa')),
  
  f4 = lmer(XRSCALK4 ~ MDIST + MFLOW + MATL + MINHIB + grade + (1+grade|CHILDID), df,
             REML=F, control=lmerControl(optimizer='bobyqa')),
  
  f5 = lmer(XRSCALK4 ~ PDIST + PFLOW + PATL + PINHIB + PSIT + grade + (1+grade|CHILDID), df,
             REML=F, control=lmerControl(optimizer='bobyqa'))
)

models_math <- list(
  theory = lmer(XMSCALK4 ~ XATTNFS + XTCHAPP + XINBCNT + grade + (1+grade|CHILDID), df,
                REML=F, control=lmerControl(optimizer='bobyqa')),
  
  f3 = lmer(XMSCALK4 ~ OATTEN + OATL + OFLOW + grade + (1+grade|CHILDID), df,
            REML=F, control=lmerControl(optimizer='bobyqa')),
  
  f4 = lmer(XMSCALK4 ~ MDIST + MFLOW + MATL + MINHIB + grade + (1+grade|CHILDID), df,
             REML=F, control=lmerControl(optimizer='bobyqa')),
  
  f5 = lmer(XMSCALK4 ~ PDIST + PFLOW + PATL + PINHIB + PSIT + grade + (1+grade|CHILDID), df,
            REML=F, control=lmerControl(optimizer='bobyqa'))
)
```

```{r}
models <- tibble(
  type = c('read', 'math'),
  model = list(models_read, models_math),
  struct = map(model, names)
) %>%
  unnest(c(model, struct)) %>%
  mutate(id = str_c(type, struct, sep='.'),
         summary = map(model, summary))

models_summary <- models$summary %>%
  set_names(models$id)

(results <- models %>%
  select(type, struct) %>%
  bind_cols(map_dfr(map(models$summary, 'AICtab'), as.list)))
```

```{r}
models_summary$read.f4
models_summary$read.theory
```

```{r}
models_summary$math.f4
models_summary$math.theory
```
